review_blob:
Nose honey, Taste pine orange ginger, Alcohol sizzle, Bitterness not overwhelming. A fine IPA all around


---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Very soft nose of honey which follows in a subtle way in the taste of the beer as well, with grass being more prominent. Nothing exciting

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Citrusy aroma, some grapefruit, rather sweet hint of peach(?) alcohol very apparent. Overall experience reminded me of a bourbon-like drink.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Tried both tap and bottle with the latter being more fulfilling. Serves nicely without excessive foaming, thick orange-brown color. Once the bottle pops open citrus, pine and earthly scents. Taste is bittersweet again with citric flavors being dominant and followed by a hint of peach (?) before the bitterness follows, perfectly balanced. Definitely the best Greek beer in the market at the moment.
